tool_description: Registers rock and soil samples in the laboratory system with metadata, location data, and sample classifications for tracking throughout analysis workflows.

sample_type.description: Type of sample: rock, soil, sediment, ore, drill_core, or grab_sample

collector_name.description: Name of person who collected the sample

sample_mass_kg.description: Total mass of sample in kilograms

error_messages: Invalid sample_type: Use one of [rock, soil, sediment, ore, drill_core, grab_sample].
Invalid coordinates: Provide valid latitude (-90 to 90) and longitude (-180 to 180) values.
Invalid sample_mass_kg: Must be a positive number greater than 0.
Duplicate sample_id: This sample ID already exists in the system.
Invalid collection_date: Provide valid ISO 8601 date-time format and cannot be in the future.
usage: Provide sample_id, sample_type, location_coordinates, collection_date, collector_name, and sample_mass_kg to register a new sample in the laboratory system.

registration_status.description: Status of sample registration (success or failed)
